Starring: Austria, Belgium, France, Indonesia, Switzerland, Siim Kallas, Pascal Kerneis, Keith Richardson, Christoffer Taxell, Erik Wesselius

Director: Friedrich Moser, Matthieu Lietaert | Length: 85 Minutes

Genre: Documentary, History

IMDb: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2279313/

Release/Country: 2012/Austria

The Brussels Business (2012) Description: THE BRUSSELS BUSINESS is a docu-thriller that dives into the grey zone underneath European democracy. An expedition into the world of the 15,000 lobbyists in the EU-capital, of the PR-conglomerates, think tanks and their all embracing networks of power and their close ties to the political elites.
